Title: Archmage
Intro: An Archmage is armed with a Seerstaff.

Rules.Name: Mount
Rules.Rule: MOUNT: This unit can have an Aelven Steed mount that is armed with Swift Hooves. If this unit has an Aelven Steed mount, it has a Move characteristic of 14" instead of 6".

Rules.Name: Elemental Shield
Rules.Rule: ABILITIES Elemental Shield is a spell that has a casting value of 6 and a range of 18". If successfully cast, until your next hero phase, the caster has a ward of 6+, and friendly units have a ward of 6+ while they are wholly within 18" of the caster.
